M

MachineRandom - Interface in core
Interface representing a game component that requires a machine-generated random number (that is, it does not require any interaction from the player), usually to initialize one or more of its attributes at the start of every game

MainGameController - Class in controllers
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the main gameplay
MainGameController(MainScreen, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controllers.MainGameController
Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to the main screen and the central class providing all the methods necessary to play the game as parameters
MainScreen - Class in gui
Class implementing a MainScreen window as part of the GUI for the game
MainScreen(ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class gui.MainScreen
Creates a MainScreen object
marry() - Method in class core.Player
Sets the attribute of the player to married
MATCHED_CAREER - Static variable in class cards.BlueCard
Flag value indicating that the career match of the blue card matches the player's career
MAX_BOOK_PAYMENT - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.WriteABook
Maximum possible payment for writing a book (decided upon by the programmers to be $20000)
MAX_CHARITY_BENEFIT - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.SetupSchool
Maximum possible charity benefit (decided upon by the programmers to be $150000)
MAX_ITEM_PRICE - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.SellAnItem
Maximum possible price of the item (decided upon by the programmers to be $10000)
MAX_NUM_PLAYERS - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Per the specifications, there must be at most three players.
MIN_BOOK_PAYMENT - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.WriteABook
Minimum possible payment for writing a book (decided upon by the programmers to be $5000)
MIN_CHARITY_BENEFIT - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.SetupSchool
Minimum possible charity benefit (decided upon by the programmers to be $50000)
MIN_ITEM_PRICE - Static variable in class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.SellAnItem
Minimum possible price of the item (decided upon by the programmers to be $1000)
MIN_NUM_PLAYERS - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Per the specifications, there must be at least two players.
MIN_NUM_SALARY_CARDS - Static variable in class decks.SalaryCardDeck
The machine project specifications state there must be at least 10 unique salary cards.
move(int) - Method in class core.GameMaster
Advances the position of the player by the specified number of spaces, following the rules of the game (for instance, a player must prematurely stop on a magenta space)
move(int, Board) - Method in class core.Player
Advances the position of the player by the specified number of spaces, subject to the condition that the player has to prematurely stop upon landing on a magenta space
movePeg(String, int, int) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Moves the player peg of the specified player
MULTIPLIER - Static variable in class cards.blue_cards.TipTheServer
Multiplier for getting the final amount to be paid
MULTIPLIER - Static variable in class cards.blue_cards.WorldCup
Multiplier for determining the amount to be paid
MULTIPLIER - Static variable in class cards.HouseCard
The programmers decided to implement the house prices in multiples of 1000.
